title: Please identify this san-serif
content:
Does anyone know which typeface is being used here? It has elements of Avant Garde and Future but I can't figure it out.

[http://www.aisleone.net/wp-content/2008/08/bvd1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516130812/http:/www.aisleone.net/wp-content/2008/08/bvd1.jpg)
author: YOTS
